statement.name: GetContractsByVendors
statement.sql:
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_id, SUM(purchase_order_count) AS purchase_order_count, SUM(spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount, SUM(original_amount) AS original_amount FROM contracts_fy_po_vendor_summary_vw c JOIN ref_year y ON c.start_year = y.year_value JOIN ref_year y1 ON c.end_year = y1.year_value
GROUP BY vendor_id, vendor_name

statement.name: GetContractsByAwardMethods
statement.sql:
SELECT award_method_id, award_method_name, SUM(purchase_order_count) AS purchase_order_count, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount, SUM(original_amount) AS original_amount, SUM(spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date
FROM contracts_fy_award_method_summary_vw c
FROM contracts_fy_award_method_vendor_summary c
JOIN ref_year y ON c.start_year = y.year_value JOIN ref_year y1 ON c.end_year = y1.year_value
GROUP BY award_method_name, award_method_id

statement.name: GetContractsByPurchaseOrders
statement.sql:
SELECT contract_id, purpose, vendor_name, SUM(release_line_total_amount) AS total_amount, SUM(release_line_original_amount) AS original_amount, SUM(release_line_spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date FROM all_agreement_transactions
'PO' 'Y'
GROUP BY contract_id, purpose, vendor_name

statement.name: GetContractsByBoroughs
statement.sql:
SELECT location_borough_name, SUM(purchase_order_count) AS purchase_order_count, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount, SUM(original_amount) AS original_amount, SUM(spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date FROM contracts_fy_borough_summary_vw
GROUP BY location_borough_name

statement.name: GetContractsByGrants
statement.sql:
SELECT grant_id, grant_name, SUM(purchase_order_count) AS purchase_order_count, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount, SUM(original_amount) AS original_amount, SUM(spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date FROM contracts_fy_grant_summary_vw
GROUP BY grant_id, grant_name

statement.name: GetContractsBlanketAgreements
statement.sql:
SELECT contract_id, purpose, vendor_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount, SUM(original_amount) AS original_amount, SUM(spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date, SUM(amount_difference) AS dollar_difference, AVG(percent_difference) AS percent_difference FROM contract_agreements_fy_vendor c JOIN ref_year y ON c.start_year = y.year_value JOIN ref_year y1 ON c.end_year = y1.year_value
'BA'
AND amount_difference != 0
GROUP BY contract_id, purpose, vendor_name

statement.name: GetContractsPlannedAgreements
statement.sql:
SELECT contract_id, purpose, vendor_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount, SUM(original_amount) AS original_amount, SUM(spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date, SUM(amount_difference) AS dollar_difference, AVG(percent_difference) AS percent_difference FROM contract_agreements_fy_vendor c JOIN ref_year y ON c.start_year = y.year_value JOIN ref_year y1 ON c.end_year = y1.year_value
'PA'
AND amount_difference != 0
GROUP BY contract_id, purpose, vendor_name

statement.name: GetCountContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT contract_counts FROM (SELECT DISTINCT contract_id contract_counts FROM all_agreements
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT contract_id contract_counts FROM all_agreement_transactions
'PO'
) a

statement.name: GetContractsByRespCenters
statement.sql:
SELECT release_approved_year , responsibility_center_code , responsibility_center_descr , SUM(purchase_order_count) AS contract_count , SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount , SUM(original_amount) AS original_amount , SUM(spend_to_date) AS spend_to_date , SUM(amount_difference) AS delta_amount
FROM contracts_fy_responsibility_centers
FROM contracts_fy_responsibility_centers_vendor_summary
NULL
GROUP BY release_approved_year , responsibility_center_code , responsibility_center_descr
